Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ellis/132nd Place
ShortDescription: SB 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Ellis, 132nd, Ingleside, and 131st due to, street blockage near Ellis/132nd Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Ellis, 132nd, Ingleside, and 131st due to, street blockage near Ellis/132nd Place.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
